data.name: King's Bounty: Legions | Lord of Chaos Pack
data.detailed_description:
A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures from the Chaos faction with a nice discount!

Primordial chaos retreated under the pressure of the Creator. Forced beyond the borders of corporeality, unbeaten and primal, it now bides its time for a decisive attack. Touched by the palm of Chaos, Possessed Bears charge into battle without fear. Ghosts feast on the souls of fallen enemies, restoring their losses. Inventors and Eyebeasts attack from a distance, while Demonologists, endowed with almost infinite magical power, sow true chaos on the battlefield.

Purchase this pack and command Chaos itself!
You will receive 5 types of carefully selected creatures to form a battleworthy army, and, as a bonus - Royal Aura for 7 days.

Creatures in the pack:

  • 7 Demonologists;
  • 14 Eyebeasts;
  • 8 Inventors;
  • 18 Ghosts;
  • 20 Possessed Bears.

Royal Aura provides:

  • +100% gold;
  • +10% leadership;
  • x2 resources drop chance per each fight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Gyz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none
